creator: snag hazzard
title: Make a Tutorial Video From A Feature Film
description: This project explains how to create a tutorial video using scenes extracted from feature films, capitalizing on instances where a process is clearly demonstrated within the film.
steps: Identify scenes from feature films that clearly demonstrate a particular process or skill.
Extract the chosen scene(s) from the film.
Edit the extracted scene(s) to create a concise and informative tutorial video.
Optionally, add explanatory narration or text overlays to enhance clarity.
